FuncDef:
The domain command adds a domain to a domain list.
The undo domain command deletes a domain from a domain list.
By default, no domain is added to a domain list.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a domain name, with "*", "?", and """ not supported.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 case-insensitive characters.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before preventing users in a domain from accessing an interface, or enabling the users to access an interface, use the domain command to add the domain to a domain list.
Prerequisites
The domain to be added to a domain list has been created.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
